descriptions.version_x: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
descriptions.version_y: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: Desolate Land
abilities.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.
